mapper.insert: /* AuthWriterMapper.insertUser - 사용자 등록 */ INSERT INTO users ( username, email, password_hash, display_name, created_at, updated_at, is_active ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{displayName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{isActive} )
mapper.update: /* AuthWriterMapper.updateUser - 사용자 정보 수정 */ UPDATE users SET email = #{email}, display_name = #{displayName}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: /* AuthWriterMapper.insertUserSession - 사용자 세션 생성 */ INSERT INTO user_sessions ( user_id, session_token, session_name, created_at, last_activity, is_active ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{sessionToken}, #{sessionName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{isActive} )
